SELECT pdp.*,pda.name as activity_name FROM promotion_discount_product pdp LEFT JOIN promotion_discount_activity pda ON pdp.activity_id = pda.id
AND pdp.sku_id in
#{skuId}
AND pda.start_time <= CURRENT_TIME AND pda.end_time >= CURRENT_TIME AND pda.`status` = 0 AND pda.deleted =0 AND pdp.deleted = 0
ORDER BY pdp.id DESC
